summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5883 for the improvement of 33rd Avenue West, from Clise Place to 32nd Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77521, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
